name: Golf Extreme
storyline:
Do you find Golf boring? Our Fox will prove to you that this is an exciting game! You will be able to hone accuracy, logic and thinking! 
 
The rules are simple: calculate the trajectory and score balls in all holes, use no more than 10 strokes. The difficulty increases with each level. New obstacles appear on the way to the holes. You will need accuracy and fine calculation! 
 
You don't have to carry clubs, run around the field and collect balls in our Golf. You can play without getting up from your chair!
summary: Become a master in our casual Golf game with physics and puzzle elements. Help the Fox to calculate the trajectory and score balls in the holes. There are 100 levels, 100 achievements and incredible excitement!
